venue.address_2: Use fitness ctr entrance in rear of bldg
venue.name: Jewish Community Center

item.description:
Hi everyone,

OSDBC took the last couple months off. But now is time to start thinking about Spring and getting in shape for the upcoming season. We'll be starting our indoor pool practice on Dec. 1st at the JCC.

OSDBC is actively recruiting new members for all positions (paddlers, steerperson and drummers). This is a great time to get involved, meet some of the other members and be get prepare for the 'on the water' practice.

Come down and be a part of this exciting growing sport. Fees are cheap, $5/practice and your first time is free. We look forward to seeing you there.

OSDBC
item.name: Indoor pool practice
